sentences.sContent: But, owing to the nature of ancient kinship, as we have seen it, exogamy afforded no proper security against the intermixture of persons near of kin.
sentences.sContent_eng: But, owing to the nature of ancient kinship, as we have seen it, exogamy afforded no proper security against the intermixture of persons near of kin.
sentences.sCn: 但是，由于古代血族关系的性质，如我们所知，异族结婚不提供适当的安全反对血缘亲近的人们的混合…

words.tran: 异族结婚的，异族通婚的

trans.tranOther: the custom or an act of marrying a person belonging to another tribe, clan, or similar social unit
